vportTable.name: vportTable
vportTable.description: A list of Virtual Port instances.

vportNumber.name: vportNumber
vportNumber.description: A unique number identifies this Virtual Port instance within the physical OmniSwitch. This number is NOT meant for user consumption.

vportSlot.name: vportSlot
vportSlot.description: The physical slot number for this port instance (vport).

vportFuncType.name: vportFuncType
vportFuncType.description: The function for this vport. ie. local, remote, atm.

vportFuncTypeInstance.name: vportFuncTypeInstance
vportFuncTypeInstance.description: The specific instance of this slot/IF/type. For 'most' interface types this will always be 1. The exception is an ATM connected port.

vportVlanNumber.name: vportVlanNumber
vportVlanNumber.description: The VLAN that this virtual port belongs to. The default for row creation is 1.

vportMACaddress.name: vportMACaddress
vportMACaddress.description: The MAC address represented by this Virtual Port. This value is returned upon row creation and attachment.

vportBridgeProtocol.name: vportBridgeProtocol
vportBridgeProtocol.description: The type of bridge protocol supported for this service. The default rfor row creation is transparent(3).

vportEncapsulation.name: vportEncapsulation
vportEncapsulation.description: The frame encapsulation translation to be used for this particular port. The value indicates the frame format required for the output interface. The default for row creation is default(2) the meaning of which is dependent on the media type of the port

vportBrdgMode.name: vportBrdgMode
vportBrdgMode.description: If vportFuncType is either localBridge(1) or localOpSwitch(2) type, setting this field to autoSwitch(3), the default, will allow the port to switch between the localBridge(1) or localOpSwitch(2) mode. The forceBridge(4) mode will prevent the localBridge(1) mode to switch to localOpSwitch(2) mode even there is only one MAC address is detacted. The forceSwitch(5) mode prevents the localOpSwitch(2) mode to switch to localBridge(1) mode. The user would have to make sure no loop is formed in the network in this case. The default is autoSwitch(3).

vportSwitchTimer.name: vportSwitchTimer
vportSwitchTimer.description: The time out period for a Bridged port to convert to a switch optimized mode in seconds if vportBrdgMode is set to autoSwitch(1). Setting it to zero will cause automactic switching between the two modes immediately. The default is 60 seconds.

vportDescription.name: vportDescription
vportDescription.description: A string to identify the instance of this port.

vportAdmStatus.name: vportAdmStatus
vportAdmStatus.description: The administrative status of this port which the user can attach or detach during configuration. The attached port can also be switched to disable(1) or enable(2), or delete(3). create(4) and modify(5) are used ONLY for traps.

vportOperStatus.name: vportOperStatus
vportOperStatus.description: The operational status of this virtual port. This is called slot/if/type/instance???. Note that if the card is removed for this slot, the service will be marked as portDown(1). The chassis MIB will maintain the record of the card be absent....

vportFrameIns.name: vportFrameIns
vportFrameIns.description: The number of frames received from this port.

vportInOctets.name: vportInOctets
vportInOctets.description: The total number of octets received from this port.

vportInUcastPkts.name: vportInUcastPkts
vportInUcastPkts.description: The total number of subnetwork-unicast packets received.

vportInNUcastPkts.name: vportInNUcastPkts
vportInNUcastPkts.description: The total number of non-unicast packets received.

vportInBufDiscs.name: vportInBufDiscs
vportInBufDiscs.description: The number of inbound frames discarded from this port due to receive queue overrun.

vportInErrDiscs.name: vportInErrDiscs
vportInErrDiscs.description: The number of inbound frames discarded from this port due to error.

vportFrameOuts.name: vportFrameOuts
vportFrameOuts.description: The number of frames transmitted from this port.

vportOutOctets.name: vportOutOctets
vportOutOctets.description: The total number of octets transmitted from this port.

vportOutUcastPkts.name: vportOutUcastPkts
vportOutUcastPkts.description: The total number of subnetwork-unicast packets transmitted.

vportOutNUcastPkts.name: vportOutNUcastPkts
vportOutNUcastPkts.description: The total number of non-unicast packets transmitted.

vportOutBufDiscs.name: vportOutBufDiscs
vportOutBufDiscs.description: The number of outbound frames discarded from this port due to transmit queue overrun.

vportOutErrDiscs.name: vportOutErrDiscs
vportOutErrDiscs.description: The number of outbound frames discarded from this port due to error.

vportFloodLimit.name: vportFloodLimit
vportFloodLimit.description: The amount of flooded bandwidth in byte / second that may be transmitted on this port.

vportVLANMembership.name: vportVLANMembership
vportVLANMembership.description: This object is a bit mask with each bit that is set indicating that the VLAN given by the bit position is active on this port.

vportManualMode.name: vportManualMode
vportManualMode.description: This setting permits the user to manually set the spanning tree state of the given port. It is designed primarily for those virtual ports that can not utilize the IBM spanning tree algorithm. If set to the manual mode (ether manual_override_forwarding or manual_override_blockng), the IEEE or IBM spanning tree algorithm is disabled for the given port.

vportMVLANMembership.name: vportMVLANMembership
vportMVLANMembership.description: This object is a bit mask with each bit that is set indicating that the Multicast VLAN given by the bit position is active on this port.

vportFloodLimitDiscs.name: vportFloodLimitDiscs
vportFloodLimitDiscs.description: The number of outbound frames discarded from this port due to the flood limit being exceed.

vportIfIndex.name: vportIfIndex
vportIfIndex.description: The MIB-2 interface table 'ifIndex' assigned to this virtual port.

phyPortTable.name: phyPortTable
phyPortTable.description: A list of Physical Port instances.

phyPortSlot.name: phyPortSlot
phyPortSlot.description: The physical slot number for this port.

phyPortMediaType.name: phyPortMediaType
phyPortMediaType.description: The device type of this physical port

phyPortDescription.name: phyPortDescription
phyPortDescription.description: A string to identify the instance of this port.

phyPortAdmStatus.name: phyPortAdmStatus
phyPortAdmStatus.description: The administrative status of this port. The user can enable or disable this physical port.

phyPortOperStatus.name: phyPortOperStatus
phyPortOperStatus.description: The operational status of this port.

phyPortFrameIns.name: phyPortFrameIns
phyPortFrameIns.description: The number of frames received from this port.

phyPortInOctets.name: phyPortInOctets
phyPortInOctets.description: The total number of octets received from this port.

phyPortInUcastPkts.name: phyPortInUcastPkts
phyPortInUcastPkts.description: The total number of subnetwork-unicast packets received.

phyPortInNUcastPkts.name: phyPortInNUcastPkts
phyPortInNUcastPkts.description: The total number of non-unicast packets received.

phyPortInBufDiscs.name: phyPortInBufDiscs
phyPortInBufDiscs.description: The number of inbound frames discarded from this port due to receive queue overrun.

phyPortInErrDiscs.name: phyPortInErrDiscs
phyPortInErrDiscs.description: The number of inbound frames discarded from this port due to error.

phyPortFrameOuts.name: phyPortFrameOuts
phyPortFrameOuts.description: The number of frames transmitted from this port.

phyPortOutOctets.name: phyPortOutOctets
phyPortOutOctets.description: The total number of octets transmitted from this port.

phyPortOutUcastPkts.name: phyPortOutUcastPkts
phyPortOutUcastPkts.description: The total number of subnetwork-unicast packets transmitted.

phyPortOutNUcastPkts.name: phyPortOutNUcastPkts
phyPortOutNUcastPkts.description: The total number of non-unicast packets transmitted.

phyPortOutBufDiscs.name: phyPortOutBufDiscs
phyPortOutBufDiscs.description: The number of outbound frames discarded from this port due to transmit queue overrun.

phyPortOutErrDiscs.name: phyPortOutErrDiscs
phyPortOutErrDiscs.description: The number of outbound frames discarded from this port due to error.

phyPortToInterface.name: phyPortToInterface
phyPortToInterface.description: The interface number which instantiates the MIB-2 'ifTable' for this physical port. It is calculated as 'phyPortSlot' multipled by 100 plus 'phyPortIF' for this physical port.

phyPortFddiAdmMode.name: phyPortFddiAdmMode
phyPortFddiAdmMode.description: The administrative mode of this FDDI port. The user can set this port to either station(2) of concentrator(3) mode. NOTE: this does not take effect until the SMT subsystem is restarted. Examine the phyPortFddiOpMode to see the current operational mode. The administrative mode will be invalid(1) for all but FDDI or CDDI boards.

phyPortFddiOpMode.name: phyPortFddiOpMode
phyPortFddiOpMode.description: The current station Operational Mode of this FDDI port. The Operational Mode will be invalid(1) for all but FDDI or CDDI boards.

phyPortFddiMacFlushMode.name: phyPortFddiMacFlushMode
phyPortFddiMacFlushMode.description: The current MAC address flush mode (only valid for FDDI ports of mode concentrator). This controls whether MAC addresses will be flushed if any PHY port disconnects are detected. The MAC address flush mode will be invalid(1) for all but FDDI or CDDI boards.

mesmConfTable.name: mesmConfTable
mesmConfTable.description: A list of MESM Physical Port instances.

mesmPortSlot.name: mesmPortSlot
mesmPortSlot.description: The physical slot number for this MESM port.

mesmPortIF.name: mesmPortIF
mesmPortIF.description: The on-board interface number for this MESM port.

mesmPortAutoNegotiate.name: mesmPortAutoNegotiate
mesmPortAutoNegotiate.description: The current autonegotiate mode of this MESM port. This object decides if port line speed and duplex mode are controlled by the user or negotiated automatically.

mesmPortAutoSpeed.name: mesmPortAutoSpeed
mesmPortAutoSpeed.description: The automatically detected port line speed of this MESM port.

mesmPortAutoDuplexMode.name: mesmPortAutoDuplexMode
mesmPortAutoDuplexMode.description: The automatically detected port duplex mode of this MESM port.

mesmPortCfgSpeed.name: mesmPortCfgSpeed
mesmPortCfgSpeed.description: The configured port line speed of this MESM port.

mesmPortCfgDuplexMode.name: mesmPortCfgDuplexMode
mesmPortCfgDuplexMode.description: The configured port duplex mode of this MESM port.

phyPortPCause.name: phyPortPCause
phyPortPCause.description: The cause for a port partitioning event. This object is not intended to be accessed directly. It is defined for use in port partitioning traps.

vportSwitchTable.name: vportSwitchTable
vportSwitchTable.description: A list of Virtual Port instances.

vportSwitchEntry.name: vportSwitchEntry
vportSwitchEntry.description: A Virtual Port Switch Options entry.

vportSwitchSlot.name: vportSwitchSlot
vportSwitchSlot.description: The physical slot number for this port instance (vport).

vportSwitchFuncType.name: vportSwitchFuncType
vportSwitchFuncType.description: The function for this vport. ie. local, remote, atm.

vportSwitchFuncTypeInstance.name: vportSwitchFuncTypeInstance
vportSwitchFuncTypeInstance.description: The specific instance of this slot/IF/type. For 'most' interface types this will always be 1. The exception is an ATM connected port.

vportSwitchipEthertype.name: vportSwitchipEthertype
vportSwitchipEthertype.description: A Virtual Port Switch translation option for IP Ethertype traffic.

vportSwitchipSnap.name: vportSwitchipSnap
vportSwitchipSnap.description: A Virtual Port Switch translation option for IP SNAP traffic.

vportSwitchipxEthertype.name: vportSwitchipxEthertype
vportSwitchipxEthertype.description: A Virtual Port Switch translation option for IPX Ethertype traffic.

vportSwitchipxProp.name: vportSwitchipxProp
vportSwitchipxProp.description: A Virtual Port Switch translation option for IPX 802.3 traffic.

vportSwitchipxLlc.name: vportSwitchipxLlc
vportSwitchipxLlc.description: A Virtual Port Switch translation option for IPX 802.2 traffic.

vportSwitchipxSnap.name: vportSwitchipxSnap
vportSwitchipxSnap.description: A Virtual Port Switch translation option for IPX SNAP traffic.

vportSwitchDefaultEntry.name: vportSwitchDefaultEntry
vportSwitchDefaultEntry.description: A Virtual Port Switch Options entry.

vportSwitchDefaultIndex.name: vportSwitchDefaultIndex
vportSwitchDefaultIndex.description: The index selecting which media type default is to be configured/viewed.

vportSwitchDefaultipEthertype.name: vportSwitchDefaultipEthertype
vportSwitchDefaultipEthertype.description: A Virtual Port Switch translation option for IP Ethertype traffic.

vportSwitchDefaultipSnap.name: vportSwitchDefaultipSnap
vportSwitchDefaultipSnap.description: A Virtual Port Switch translation option for IP SNAP traffic.

vportSwitchDefaultipxEthertype.name: vportSwitchDefaultipxEthertype
vportSwitchDefaultipxEthertype.description: A Virtual Port Switch translation option for IPX Ethertype traffic.

vportSwitchDefaultipxProp.name: vportSwitchDefaultipxProp
vportSwitchDefaultipxProp.description: A Virtual Port Switch translation option for IPX 802.3 traffic.

vportSwitchDefaultipxLlc.name: vportSwitchDefaultipxLlc
vportSwitchDefaultipxLlc.description: A Virtual Port Switch translation option for IPX LLC traffic.

vportSwitchDefaultipxSnap.name: vportSwitchDefaultipxSnap
vportSwitchDefaultipxSnap.description: A Virtual Port Switch translation option for IPX SNAP traffic.

mirrorTable.name: mirrorTable
mirrorTable.description: A list of Virtual Port instances.

mirrorNumber.name: mirrorNumber
mirrorNumber.description: A unique number identifies this Virtual Port instance within the physical OmniSwitch. This number is NOT meant for user consumption.

mirrorSlot.name: mirrorSlot
mirrorSlot.description: The physical slot number for this port instance (mirror).

mirrorFuncType.name: mirrorFuncType
mirrorFuncType.description: The function for this Vport. ie. local, remote, atm.

mirrorFuncTypeInstance.name: mirrorFuncTypeInstance
mirrorFuncTypeInstance.description: The specific instance of this slot/IF/type. For 'most' interface types this will always be 1. The exception is an ATM connected port.

mirrorMirroringSlot.name: mirrorMirroringSlot
mirrorMirroringSlot.description: The physical slot number of the mirroring port.

mirrorMirroringIF.name: mirrorMirroringIF
mirrorMirroringIF.description: The on-board interface number or the mirroring port.

mirrorMirroringFuncType.name: mirrorMirroringFuncType
mirrorMirroringFuncType.description: The function for this Vport. ie. local, remote, atm.

mirrorMirroringFuncTypeInstance.name: mirrorMirroringFuncTypeInstance
mirrorMirroringFuncTypeInstance.description: The specific instance of this slot/IF/type. For 'most' interface types this will always be 1. The exception is an ATM connected port.

mirrorStatus.name: mirrorStatus
mirrorStatus.description: Whether mirroring is enabled or disabled for this port. prior to enabling mirroring, or at the same time all other read write values in this table for the same row must be set to appropriate values, or defaults will be assumed.
